body_html: @meteorcloudy Yes, we could define a hasher for use with the unordered map, that was the primary motivation for grabbing StringPiece (it already had one defined). I'm unfortunately AFK for the next few days, understand if you need to roll back in the meantime, might not be too hard to dupe a custom hasher into that translation unit though.

body: @meteorcloudy Yes, we could define a hasher for use with the unordered map, that was the primary motivation for grabbing StringPiece (it already had one defined). I'm unfortunately AFK for the next few days, understand if you need to roll back in the meantime, might not be too hard to dupe a custom hasher into that translation unit though.
